allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Phase 1 frontend - 10 pages with full UI components

- Add landing page with hero, categories, featured talent, and Join as Talent CTA
- Add browse talent catalog with search, filters, and sorting
- Add individual talent profile pages with dynamic routes
- Add checkout page with booking form and payment selection
- Add booking confirmation and tracking page
- Add How It Works page with 4-step process and FAQ
- Add comprehensive FAQ page with 35 questions across 6 categories
- Add For Business page with use cases, pricing tiers, and testimonials
- Add Join as Talent page with 5-section application form
- Add About Us page with mission, story, values, timeline, and team
- Update navigation with all page links and styled currency dropdown
- Update footer with social media icons \(X, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, Email\)
- Fix smart quotes issue in join page causing build errors
- Update README with complete project structure and roadmap
- All pages responsive with mobile-first design
- Dark theme with purple/pink gradient branding
- TypeScript types for all entities

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
